user_query: Create an agent that can manage Notion pages and databases, and search Pipedream documentation

agent_spec.name: Notion Workspace Agent
agent_spec.description: An agent that can create pages, update pages, query databases, and manage content in Notion workspaces using Pipedream MCP tools

tools_required.purpose: Create, update, and manage Notion pages and databases via Pipedream MCP
Search Pipedream documentation and knowledge base

actions.name: create_page
actions.description: Create a new page in Notion under a parent page with a title and content

parent.description: The parent page ID where the new page will be created

title.description: The title of the new page (defaults to 'Untitled')

pageContent.description: The content of the page using Markdown syntax

actions.name: update_page
actions.description: Update an existing Notion page's properties, title, icon, or cover

parentDataSource.description: The data source ID that contains the page to update

pageId.description: The ID of the page to update

archived.description: Set to true to archive (delete) or false to un-archive (restore) a page

actions.name: append_block
actions.description: Append new content blocks to an existing Notion page or block

blockId.description: The ID of the parent block or page to append content to

children.description: Array of block objects to append

actions.name: query_database
actions.description: Retrieve and query content from a Notion database (data source)

dataSourceId.description: The ID of the Notion database/data source to query

actions.name: create_database
actions.description: Create a new Notion database with specified properties and schema

parent.description: The parent page ID where the database will be created

actions.name: create_comment
actions.description: Create a comment on a Notion page or in an existing discussion thread

pageId.description: The ID of the page to comment on

discussionId.description: Optional: The ID of an existing discussion thread to reply to

richText.description: The comment content as rich text blocks

actions.name: search_pipedream_docs
actions.description: Search across the Pipedream knowledge base to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides

query.description: A query to search the Pipedream content with. Use this to find documentation, examples, or API references.

examples.user: Create a new page called 'Meeting Notes' in my workspace
examples.assistant: I'll create a new page titled 'Meeting Notes' for you. [Executes notion-create-page action with the title]

examples.user: Add some content to page abc123 about project updates
examples.assistant: I'll append new content blocks to that page with the project updates. [Executes notion-append-block action]

examples.user: Show me all items in my Tasks database
examples.assistant: I'll query your Tasks database and retrieve all the items. [Executes notion-retrieve-database-content action]

examples.user: Update the page xyz789 to change its title
examples.assistant: I'll update that page with the new title. [Executes notion-update-page action]

examples.user: Create a new database for tracking projects with Name, Status, and Due Date columns
examples.assistant: I'll create a new database with those properties. [Executes notion-create-database action with schema]

examples.user: Add a comment to page abc123 saying 'Great work on this!'
examples.assistant: I'll add that comment to the page. [Executes notion-create-comment action]

examples.user: Search Pipedream docs for how to use Notion MCP tools
examples.assistant: I'll search the Pipedream documentation for information about Notion MCP tools. [Executes SearchPipedream action]

metadata.description: Notion workspace integration via Pipedream MCP. Create pages, update content, query databases, and manage your Notion workspace.
Search Pipedream knowledge base, documentation, code examples, and API references via MCP
